meanings.sent1: She is a staunch supporter of her favorite team, always cheering them on.

meanings.definition: stop or restrict (a flow of blood) from a wound
meanings.sent1: The nurse used a bandage to staunch the bleeding from the cut.
meanings.sent2: Applying pressure to the wound helped staunch the blood flow quickly.
meanings.sent3: He tried to staunch the leak in the boat with his hand, but it didn't work well.
meanings.sent4: The plumber worked swiftly to staunch the burst pipe before it caused more damage.
meanings.sent5: The quick-thinking hiker used a tourniquet to staunch the bleeding from the injury.
